languages.text: An {g|Encyclopedia:Injury}injury{/g} that wasn't healed in time. It can be healed with a medikit, but it requires passing a {g|Encyclopedia:SkillMedicae}Medicae{/g} skill {g|Encyclopedia:Test}test{/g} to succeed. Too many injuries reduce the character's {g|Encyclopedia:Resolve}resolve{/g} and cause {g|Encyclopedia:Traumas}traumas{/g}. Visit the voidship or try to use medikit to remove the injury.
languages.original_text: Ранение, которое не было вылечено вовремя. Может быть вылечено с помощью медкомплекта, но лечение потребует {g|Encyclopedia:Test}проверки{/g} навыка {g|Encyclopedia:SkillMedicae}Медицина{/g}. Большое количество ранений снижает {g|Encyclopedia:Resolve}решимость{/g} персонажа и приводит к {g|Encyclopedia:Traumas}травмам{/g}. Чтобы вылечить ранение, нужно посетить корабль или попытаться использовать медкомплект.

traits.locale_text: An injury that wasn't healed in time. It can be healed with a medikit, but it requires passing a {g|Encyclopedia:SkillMedicae}Medicae{/g} skill test to succeed. Too many injuries reduce the character's resolve and cause traumas. Visit the voidship or try to use medikit to remove the injury.

An {g|Encyclopedia:Injury}injury{/g} that wasn't healed in time. It can be healed with a medikit, but it requires passing a {g|Encyclopedia:SkillMedicae}Medicae{/g} skill {g|Encyclopedia:Test}test{/g} to succeed. Too many injuries reduce the character's {g|Encyclopedia:Resolve}resolve{/g} and cause {g|Encyclopedia:Traumas}traumas{/g}. Visit the voidship or try to use medikit to remove the injury.

An {g|Encyclopedia:Injury}injury{/g} that wasn't healed in time. It can be healed with a medikit, but it requires passing a {g|Encyclopedia:SkillMedicae}Medicae{/g} skill {g|Encyclopedia:Test}test{/g} to succeed. Too many injuries reduce the character's {g|Encyclopedia:Resolve}resolve{/g} and cause {g|Encyclopedia:Traumas}traumas{/g}. Visit the voidship or try to use medikit to remove the injury.

languages.text: Eine {g|Encyclopedia:Injury}Verletzung{/g}, die nicht rechtzeitig geheilt wurde. Sie kann mit einem Medikit geheilt werden, dessen Erfolg allerdings vom Bestehen einer {g|Encyclopedia:SkillMedicae}Medicae{/g}-{g|Encyclopedia:Test}Fertigkeitsprobe{/g} abhängt. Zu viele Verletzungen verringern die {g|Encyclopedia:Resolve}Entschlossenheit{/g} des Charakters und führen zu {g|Encyclopedia:Traumas}Traumata{/g}. Besuche das Raumschiff oder nutze ein Medikit, um die Verletzung zu entfernen.
languages.original_text: An {g|Encyclopedia:Injury}injury{/g} that wasn't healed in time. It can be healed with a medikit, but it requires passing a {g|Encyclopedia:SkillMedicae}Medicae{/g} skill {g|Encyclopedia:Test}test{/g} to succeed. Too many injuries reduce the character's {g|Encyclopedia:Resolve}resolve{/g} and cause {g|Encyclopedia:Traumas}traumas{/g}. Visit the voidship or try to use medikit to remove the injury.

traits.locale_text: Eine Verletzung, die nicht rechtzeitig geheilt wurde. Sie kann mit einem Medikit geheilt werden, dessen Erfolg allerdings vom Bestehen einer {g|Encyclopedia:SkillMedicae}Medicae{/g}-Fertigkeitsprobe abhängt. Zu viele Verletzungen verringern die Entschlossenheit des Charakters und führen zu Traumata. Besuche das Raumschiff oder nutze ein Medikit, um die Verletzung zu entfernen.

languages.text: {g|Encyclopedia:Injury}Lésion{/g} qui n'a pas été soignée à temps. Elle peut être soignée à l'aide d'un médikit, mais il faut pour cela réussir un {g|Encyclopedia:Test}test{/g} de compétence de {g|Encyclopedia:SkillMedicae}Medicae{/g}. Un trop grand nombre de lésions réduit la {g|Encyclopedia:Resolve}détermination{/g} du personnage et provoque des {g|Encyclopedia:Traumas}traumatismes{/g}. Rendez-vous à bord du vaisseau spatial ou utilisez le médikit pour faire disparaître la lésion.
languages.original_text: An {g|Encyclopedia:Injury}injury{/g} that wasn't healed in time. It can be healed with a medikit, but it requires passing a {g|Encyclopedia:SkillMedicae}Medicae{/g} skill {g|Encyclopedia:Test}test{/g} to succeed. Too many injuries reduce the character's {g|Encyclopedia:Resolve}resolve{/g} and cause {g|Encyclopedia:Traumas}traumas{/g}. Visit the voidship or try to use medikit to remove the injury.

traits.locale_text: Lésion qui n'a pas été soignée à temps. Elle peut être soignée à l'aide d'un médikit, mais il faut pour cela réussir un test de compétence {g|Encyclopedia:SkillMedicae}Medicae{/g}. Un trop grand nombre de lésions réduit la détermination du personnage et provoque des traumatismes. Rendez-vous à bord du vaisseau spatial ou essayez d'utiliser le médikit pour faire disparaître la lésion.

languages.text: 没有及时治愈的{g|Encyclopedia:Injury}伤势{/g}。旧伤可以通过医疗包进行医疗，但使用者需要通过{g|Encyclopedia:SkillMedicae}医疗{/g}技能{g|Encyclopedia:Test}检定{/g}，才能成功治愈旧伤。如果角色承受的伤势过多，不仅会降低{g|Encyclopedia:Resolve}决心{/g}，还会产生{g|Encyclopedia:Traumas}创伤{/g}。 您可以前往虚空舰治愈伤口，或尝试使用医疗包移除伤口。
languages.original_text: An {g|Encyclopedia:Injury}injury{/g} that wasn't healed in time. It can be healed with a medikit, but it requires passing a {g|Encyclopedia:SkillMedicae}Medicae{/g} skill {g|Encyclopedia:Test}test{/g} to succeed. Too many injuries reduce the character's {g|Encyclopedia:Resolve}resolve{/g} and cause {g|Encyclopedia:Traumas}traumas{/g}. Visit the voidship or try to use medikit to remove the injury.

traits.locale_text: 没有及时治愈的伤口。旧伤可以通过医疗包进行医疗，但使用者需要通过{g|Encyclopedia:SkillMedicae}医疗{/g}技能检定，才能成功治愈旧伤。如果角色承受的伤势过多，不仅会降低决心，还会产生创伤。 您可以前往虚空舰治愈伤口，或尝试使用医疗包移除伤口。

languages.text: Una {g|Encyclopedia:Injury}lesión{/g} que no se ha tratado a tiempo. Se puede curar con un botiquín, pero es necesaria una {g|Encyclopedia:Test}prueba{/g} de habilidad de {g|Encyclopedia:SkillMedicae}Medicae{/g} para hacerlo. Un exceso de lesiones reduce la {g|Encyclopedia:Resolve}firmeza{/g} del personaje y causa {g|Encyclopedia:Traumas}aflicciones{/g}. Visita la nave del vacío o intenta usar un botiquín para tratar la lesión.
languages.original_text: An {g|Encyclopedia:Injury}injury{/g} that wasn't healed in time. It can be healed with a medikit, but it requires passing a {g|Encyclopedia:SkillMedicae}Medicae{/g} skill {g|Encyclopedia:Test}test{/g} to succeed. Too many injuries reduce the character's {g|Encyclopedia:Resolve}resolve{/g} and cause {g|Encyclopedia:Traumas}traumas{/g}. Visit the voidship or try to use medikit to remove the injury.

traits.locale_text: Una lesión que no se ha tratado a tiempo. Se puede curar con un botiquín, pero es necesaria una prueba de habilidad de {g|Encyclopedia:SkillMedicae}Medicae{/g} para hacerlo. Un exceso de lesiones reduce la firmeza del personaje y causa aflicciones. Visita la nave del vacío o intenta usar un botiquín para tratar la lesión.

languages.text: 回復が間に合わなかった{g|Encyclopedia:Injury}傷{/g}。この傷はメディキットで癒すことができるが、成功するには{g|Encyclopedia:SkillMedicae}メディケア{/g}のスキル{g|Encyclopedia:Test}判定{/g}に成功する必要がある。傷が多すぎると、キャラクターの{g|Encyclopedia:Resolve}決断力{/g}が弱まり、{g|Encyclopedia:Traumas}外傷{/g}を引き起こす。 ヴォイドシップを訪れるか、メディキットで傷の除去を試みる。
languages.original_text: An {g|Encyclopedia:Injury}injury{/g} that wasn't healed in time. It can be healed with a medikit, but it requires passing a {g|Encyclopedia:SkillMedicae}Medicae{/g} skill {g|Encyclopedia:Test}test{/g} to succeed. Too many injuries reduce the character's {g|Encyclopedia:Resolve}resolve{/g} and cause {g|Encyclopedia:Traumas}traumas{/g}. Visit the voidship or try to use medikit to remove the injury.

traits.locale_text: 回復が間に合わなかった傷。この傷はメディキットで癒すことができるが、成功するには{g|Encyclopedia:SkillMedicae}メディケア{/g}のスキルテストに合格する必要がある。傷が多すぎると、キャラクターの決断力が弱まり、外傷を引き起こす。 ヴォイドシップを訪れるか、メディキットで傷の除去を試みる。

languages.text: Ранение, которое не было вылечено вовремя. Может быть вылечено с помощью медкомплекта, но лечение потребует {g|Encyclopedia:Test}проверки{/g} навыка {g|Encyclopedia:SkillMedicae}Медицина{/g}. Большое количество ранений снижает {g|Encyclopedia:Resolve}решимость{/g} персонажа и приводит к {g|Encyclopedia:Traumas}травмам{/g}. Чтобы вылечить ранение, нужно посетить корабль или попытаться использовать медкомплект.
languages.original_text: An injury that wasn't healed in time. Can be healed with a medikit, but requires to pass a {g|Encyclopedia:SkillMedicae}Medicae{/g} skill test to succeed. Too many injuries reduce the character's resolve and cause traumas. Visit the voidship or try to use medikit to remove the injury.

Ранение, которое не было вылечено вовремя. Может быть вылечено с помощью медкомплекта, но лечение потребует проверки навыка {g|Encyclopedia:SkillMedicae}Медицина{/g}.
